title: Parsons Summer Programs Open House
desc: Pre-college, College, Adults | 2,  3, 4, and 5 week intensives |  Sessions begin June, July and August Discover how you can turn your summer experience into an opportunity without end when you join us on campus to learn more about all of our program offerings, from pre-college courses in New York, to intensives in art and design at our Paris campus and other global destinations. Take a tour of our New York campus, meet faculty and staff and enjoy hands-on design activities to inspire your next great summer adventure at Parsons! ? Date/Time:  Saturday, February 13, 2016, 2-4pm Location:  Tishman Auditorium University Center, 63 Fifth Avenue New York, NY 10003
